name: Time Paradox
dialogs: Time itself is unraveling! This is a disaster of epic proportions!
A mage's experiment with temporal magic has gone terribly wrong.
We must collect the scattered fragments before reality collapses.
These temporal fragments pulse with chronological energy.
Each stabilized rift brings us closer to restoring normal time.
The timeline is stable once more! Time flows naturally again.
You've prevented a temporal catastrophe that could have ended everything.
